description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Bursa, Turkey. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Elegant Türkiye City Escape with Onsite Thermal Spa
hotels.description: Discover the modern wonders of Bursa amid the mosques and mausoleums of the Ottoman era from the stylish Crowne Plaza Bursa, an IHG Hotel. When you're not exploring, take a dip in the indoor swimming pool, treat yourself to a traditional Turkish hammam at the Thermal SPA or enjoy a workout before a steam in the sauna. From morning to night, satisfy your every craving at Sunrise Restaurant with a buffet breakfast or at Sunset Restaurant for dinner with city views.

hotels.title: Turkey Elegant Hillside Retreat with Three Restaurants, Thermal Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of Bursa, this urban retreat stands as the city's newest accommodation, positioned adjacent to the verdant Bursa Kültür Park. The signature thermal pool provides a rejuvenating retreat with naturally heated waters, while Da Vittorio Italian Restaurant showcases authentic Italian cuisine crafted by a dedicated Italian chef and team. Comprehensive wellness facilities include a state-of-the-art spa where guests can restore physical and spiritual balance. Visitors are invited to enjoy a holistic wellness journey, with professional trainers available at the fitness centre, while savouring both city and nature views from this centrally located sanctuary.
